name: Home is where X
description:
WARNING: There's a bug that messes up with the UI if you change the game window's size, so try to play on the default size that the game opens in  :)

This was meant to be an exploration of what "home" entails as everything around it keeps changing. When friends change, when family goes away, when you physically move to another place, when you change careers, when you leave all your possessions behind.. what common denominator can you call home?

I made everything myself and ran out of time to touch upon all the subjects that I wanted to, so it ended up being very shallow and short.
